title: (x) slab serif in Martha Stewart Living - Archer (custom font by H&FJ) {Yves}
author: janesmith

comments.content: martha stewart living. now I'm thinking its custom designed. anyone know anything else closely related?

This is [Archer](http://web.archive.org/web/20100525082155/http:/typophile.com/node/31081), an exclusive typeface by Hoefler & Frere-Jones for Martha Stewart.

If you know what you're looking for or what the source of your sample is, please do a [Search](http://web.archive.org/web/20100525082155/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20martha%20stewart) first.

I'm going to make a bold statement and predict that Slab Serifs are going to be the next big design trend, font-wise. I'm see them, more and more, especially in mid to upper level home-fashion magazines.
